ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and We left the later people to say of him:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and We established for him a good name among posterity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We perpetuated his praise in later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We kept his praise among the latter generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And left for him (a goodly remembrance) among the later generations
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We perpetuated to him (praise) among the later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and left for him among the later folk
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And left for him among the later folk (the salutation):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We left mention of him among later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We left for him among the posterity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and left for him a good name among posterity:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We left (this blessing) for him among generations to come in later times:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And left for him (a goodly remembrance) among generations to come in later times:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And We let it remain upon him in the latter:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We left mention of him among those who succeeded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:78] And We left, We preserved, for him, fair praise, among posterity: [among] the prophets and communities [after him] until the Day of Resurrection [which is]:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And left for him) for Noah good praise (among the later folk) who remained after him:
